Class GuiHelper

    • getParent

      public static javafx.scene.Parent getParent​(javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader loader) throws IOException
      Generate and initialize the Scene to be setted by subscribing it to model observer this function allow to load only scene that use "basicSceneUpdater" children as controller since this method call BasicSceneUpdater.init() (a function containing initializzation of components of a scene)
      Parameters:
      loader - fxml to load
      Returns:
      loaded scene
      Throws:
      IOException - loading failed (not existing file)
